author: USA TODAY, Dr. Konstantin Chumakov and Dr. Robert Gallo, Opinion Contributors
title: An old vaccine could be a new godsend for coronavirus
description: Using the oral polio vaccine could prevent or reduce the spread of COVID-19 to immunized individuals.
content:
Using the oral polio vaccine could prevent or reduce the spread of COVID-19 to immunized individuals.
